criticalDiscovery.issue: Password Protector does not restore original PDF content
criticalDiscovery.description: When removing password protection, tool shows success message but does not restore the actual original document content
criticalDiscovery.impact: BLOCKING - Tool is demo-only, not production-ready for real use
criticalDiscovery.rootCause: Only saving first 100 characters of Base64 data instead of full document
criticalDiscovery.priority: CRITICAL - Must fix in next session
